<simpleType name="CustomerStatus"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Active"/> <enumeration value="Not Clear"/> <enumeration value="In Cancellation"/> <enumeration value="Deleted"/> <enumeration value="Internally Deleted"/> <enumeration value="Externally Deleted"/> <enumeration value="Deceased"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="LinkStatus"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Valid"/> <enumeration value="Invalid"/> <enumeration value="Evidence"/> <enumeration value="InProgress"/> <enumeration value="Delete"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="PartyUpdateStatus"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="NoCh"/> <enumeration value="Auto"/> <enumeration value="Manu"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="PartyUpdateType"> <sequence> <element name="LastChangeDate"> <annotation> <documentation>Last change date of the customer. This needs to be obtained by the caller when reading the customer data from KUMS. The value should be in the same format as received by KUMS, for example via Party.getParty.getPartyResponse.LastChangeDate</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <length value="20"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="FamilyNameStatus" type="ca:PartyUpdateStatus"/> <element name="FamilyName" type="string" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>New value for the family name (last name).</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="BirthDateStatus" type="ca:PartyUpdateStatus"/> <element name="BirthDate" type="date" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="LkmsIdStatus" type="ca:PartyUpdateStatus"/> <element name="LkmsId" type="string" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>New LKMS ID for the customer's standard address. The LKMS ID needs to be provided as 11-digit number. If the number itself is shorter, then leading zeros need to be provided.</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="assignContractToOwnerRequest"> <sequence> <element name="PartyId" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>KUMS Kundennummer</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="9"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="BAN"> <annotation> <documentation>Billing Account Number</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="9"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="AccountStatus" type="ca:BANStatus"> <annotation> <documentation>Billing Account Status</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="AccountType" type="string"> <annotation> <documentation>Billing Account Type</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="ValidFrom" type="date" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>StartDate of ContractOwnerAssignment - (Default: current date)</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="ValidTo" type="date" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>EndDate of ContractOwnerAssignment - (Default: High Value (9999-12-31))</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="User"> <annotation> <documentation>User from which the requests originates. Required for all KUMS operations. The user needs to be set up in KUMS. Depending on the source system the user can be a system user or an NT user.</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="SourceSystem"> <annotation> <documentation>Source system from which the requests originates. Note: this value is used both for calling KUMS transactions and for creating the Clarify case (value FrontendSystem). Values provided here therefore need to be known/set up in both systems.</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="20"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="Agent" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>If the user is a system user, then the agent field can be used to document the user from which the request originates. Note: only update of residential customers is supported.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="IsManual" type="boolean"> <annotation> <documentation>If true, then no automatic processing will take place. A TA-Clarify-Case will be created for all changes. If false, then automatic processing will take place as far as possible. However, there might still be a case created for manual processing of some of the updates.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="ManualReason" type="string" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>Textual description of the reason why the case shall be manual.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="User"> <annotation> <documentation>User from which the requests originates. Required for all KUMS operations. The user needs to be set up in KUMS. Depending on the source system the user can be a system user or an NT user.</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="SourceSystem"> <annotation> <documentation>Source system from which the requests originates. Note: the value sent by the client needs to be know/set up in KUMS, TA Clarify and IXOS</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="20"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="Agent" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>If the user is a system user, then the agent field can be used to document the user from which the request originates. This field is used by KUMS for documentation purposes only, not for authorization.</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="CustomerContactNumber" type="string" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>Phone number at which the customer can be reached in case there are any questions regarding the change.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="Note" type="string" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>Optional description of the change. If a manual change of master data is required, a textual description needs to be provided here. The content of this field will not be processed automatically but included in the TA Clarify case.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="BANOfKKW" type="string" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>Contains the BAN of which the customer provided the password (Kundenkennwort) to prove his identity.</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="TransactionId" type="string" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>If the caller has a unique ID for the business transaction then it should be provided in this field. The ID will be sent to Clarify as "FrontendID". If no ID is provided, then the process will generate an ID.</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="changeCustomerResponse"> <sequence> <element name="Status"> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="Accepted"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="getAssignmentStatusListRequest"> <sequence> <element name="Status" type="ca:LinkStatus" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>Linkstatus</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="ValidDate" type="date" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>optionally returns historic data for this date</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="User"> <annotation> <documentation>User from which the requests originates. con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://eai.a1telekom.at/customerassignment/xsd"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <xsd:getContractOwnerAssignmentRequest> <xsd:getBy> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->
<xsd:BAN>278900796</xsd:BAN></xsd:getBy> <!--Optional:--> <xsd:ListAllBANs>true</xsd:ListAllBANs> <!--Optional:--> <xsd:ValidDate>2011-04-27+02:00</xsd:ValidDate> <xsd:User>UCUCO01</xsd:User> <xsd:SourceSystem>CUCO</xsd:SourceSystem> </xsd:getContractOwnerAssignmentRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: getContractOwnerAssignment - getBy PartyId - list all BANs false - multiple BANs

con:request.name: getContractOwnerAssignment - getBy PartyId - list all BANs false - multiple BANs
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://eai.a1telekom.at/customerassignment/xsd"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <xsd:getContractOwnerAssignmentRequest> <xsd:getBy> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->
<xsd:PartyId>106268329</xsd:PartyId></xsd:getBy> <!--Optional:--> <xsd:ListAllBANs>false</xsd:ListAllBANs> <!--Optional:-->
<xsd:User>UCUC01</xsd:User> <xsd:SourceSystem>CUCO</xsd:SourceSystem> </xsd:getContractOwnerAssignmentRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:testStep.name: getContractOwnerAssignment - getBy PartyId - list all BANs false - non existing PartyId
